skins.shipDescription: I'm the CPU of Lastation, Black Heart. I've rushed here all the way from Gamindustri to lend you my aid. Be grateful.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Black Heart, the CPU and guardian of Lastation. Be sure to properly learn from my refined combat techniques.
skins.acquisition: I'm the CPU of Lastation, Black Heart. I've rushed here all the way from Gamindustri to lend you my aid. Be grateful.
skins.login: I'll show you how a CPU fights! I'm ready whenever you are.
skins.details: Hey... Don't you think you're a bit too close?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, isn't that enough training? From now on, let me prove my worth in actual combat.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I was just thinking... the ocean sure is beautiful, isn't it? Why don't we go for a swim to clear our minds?
skins.secretaryIdle3: You sure are spaced out. I wouldn't be opposed to helping lift your spirits, you know.
skins.secretaryTouch: W-wait... suddenly touching me like that... of course I'd be shocked!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Even if you're the commander... I won't allow you to go any further.

skins.shipDescription: It's good to take it easy and celebrate once in a while, but especially in moments like these, you can't afford to let your guard down. Commander, why don't we spar for a bit? Don't even think about holding back - come at me!
